DOC.detailed_description: The study follow NCT01844362 . Uterus transplantation perform live donor patient uterine factor infertility . If perform transplantation . Organ procurement donor perform robotic assist laparoscopy . Transplantation laparotomy . Embryo transfer do 10-12 month transplantation . After birth 1-3 child uterus remove hysterectomy .
DOC.criteria: age 38 year absolute uterine factor infertility BMI < 30 systemic disease psychiatric disease
